title: New Forest Boutique Retreat with Set-Menu Dinner, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Feel utterly at home at this charming stay set within a Georgian building in the heart of Lymington, a picturesque coastal town in Hampshire. With just 27 boutique rooms that blend old-world charm with modern comforts, Stanwell House is an idyllic English countryside retreat.

Nestled between the South Coast and the New Forest, this quaint hotel’s location is equal parts seaside serenity and woodland wonderland. Awaken each morning to a bountiful buffet and a la carte breakfast, before setting out to uncover nearby castles, bathe in the Lymington Sea Water Baths or ride through twisting forest paths via bicycle.

After days of exploration, retreat to one of the hotel’s elegant eateries, Samphire, Orangery or Salt Bar, for a world-class three-course dinner. When the sun paints the sky in pink hues, savour your nightly cocktail in the enchanting courtyard.
offer_address: 14-15 High St, Lymington, New Forest, Hampshire, SO41 9AA, United Kingdom

title: Award-Winning Hampshire Manor with Acclaimed Dining & Outdoor Pool
description: Embrace old English charm at Tylney Hall Hotel and Gardens, a distinguished manor in the heart of Hampshire's verdant countryside. This award-winning estate, boasting an outdoor pool and relaxing leisure facilities, offers both indulgence and laidback tranquillity. Wander through the manicured gardens, dine in the highly acclaimed Oak Room Restaurant, or tee off at the nearby championship golf course.
offer_address: Ridge Ln, Rotherwick, Hook Hampshire RG27 9AZ, United Kingdom

title: UK: Elegant Hampshire Manor House Luxury with Country Club & Spa
description:
Enter a world of old-school opulence with a stay at this ivy-clad 18th-century country estate on England's southern coast. Set on 130 acres of crisp green Hampshire countryside, the five-star Chewton Glen Hotel & Spa offers the perfect combination of rural charm and modern luxury.

Reset your natural rhythms with a treatment at the acclaimed Chewton Glen Spa, then unwind in the hydrotherapy pool, sauna or steam room. Take advantage of the hotel's sprawling grounds with a game of golf, before indulging in English fine dining at The Dining Room, or fresh farm-to-table fare at the Kitchen, run by celebrity chef James Martin.
offer_address: Christchurch Rd, New Forest, New Milton, Hampshire BH25 6QS, United Kingdom

title: Hampshire Country Resort with Two Indoor Swimming Pools
description:
Prepare to be delighted by the wonders of Basingstoke and beyond with a relaxing stay at Hampshire Court Hotel & Spa. Steeped in rich heritage, this charming corner of England will delight history lovers, architecture enthusiasts and gourmands alike, as well as those seeking a tranquil country atmosphere. 

Within close reach, you'll find Leisure Park, Milestones Museum, Whitchurch Silk Mill, and further afield Stratfield Saye House offers a fascinating insight into the life of the Great Duke of Wellington. Exceptional onsite facilities include 90 comfortable rooms, a tranquil spa for well-deserved pampering, a state-of-the-art renovated gym, five tennis courts, and two indoor swimming pools. Don't miss The Hampshire Restaurant with its innovative menu complemented by an exceptional wine list.
offer_address: Centre Dr, Chineham, Basingstoke RG24 8FY, United Kingdom
